title: The Symbolism of Black Panther | The Danger of Identity
description:
Black Panther explores the symbolism of identity and shows us the opportunities and dangers identity carries with it. By treating Wakanda as a mythological version of Africa,  the movies explores family, nation and authority as well as alienation and how those who are marginal come to threaten established authority.

facebook group for The Symbolic World:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/1989208418065298/

subreddit for The Symbolic World: https://www.reddit.com/r/TheSymbolicWorld/
